Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
In an XSD, the appearance of the content in the content editor can be configured in various ways:

  • widgets used for elements are configurable,
  • elements can be hidden dependend on context information (e.g., depending on the user)
  • elements can be grouped into tabs
  • ....

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: For each content type you can configure the content editor's appearance via several options in the schema definition. Get an overview of the available options.

Link.LinkText: See here to find out where to place configuration options in an XSD in general.
